name: golden road
description:
Hey buddy, have you ever driven around your city?

Come and try this game!

This game provides players with a variety of different cars to choose from. You can start the car by turning on the engine, use the directional keys to control the direction of the car, use the space bar to brake, and even turn on the headlights. The scene is in a beautiful small town, with houses nearby and mountains and fields in the distance. Would you like to drive there and take a look?

Gameplay

You need better driving skills.

Bringing you a brand new driving experience and enjoying driving pleasure.

Realistic urban car driving experience

A detailed car with realistic interior and a powerful car with real engine power

Perfectly recreating the shape of cars in the real world, let's gallop freely in the city!

A car simulation game with novel themes and unique gameplay, using very common control methods. After entering the game, players will drive a realistic and cool car, galloping on the road, and enjoying the thrilling thrill of racing.
